blocks.name: ltxr
blocks.content: The 'less than' binary relation on the set of extended reals. Definition 12-3.1 of [Gleason] p. 173. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltxr(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wo(wo(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr))))))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wo(wo(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr)))), wo(wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1), wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1)), wo(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wo(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr))))))
  orbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1), wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wo(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr)))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1))))
  brab2a(hs0, hs1, c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1, cr, cr, wbr(c0, cltrr, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))
  breq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c1, cltrr)
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1))))
  df-3an(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wo(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr)))), wo(wbr(c0, cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), c1), wbr(c0, cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), c1)))
  brun(c0, cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), c1)
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wo(wbr(c0, cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), c1), wbr(c0, cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), c1)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wo(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr)))), wo(wo(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf))), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr))))
  orbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), c1), wbr(c0, cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), c1), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf))), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), c1), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf))), wa(wcel(c0, cun(cr, csn(cmnf))), wcel(c1, csn(cpnf))))
  brxp(c0, cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf), c1)
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wa(wcel(c0, cun(cr, csn(cmnf))), wcel(c1, csn(cpnf))), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf))), wa(wo(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c0, cr)), wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  bi2anan9(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cun(cr, csn(cmnf))), wcel(c1, csn(cpnf)), wo(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c0, cr)), wceq(c1, cpnf))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c0, cun(cr, csn(cmnf))), wo(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c0, cr)), wo(wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(c0, cr)))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cun(cr, csn(cmnf))), wo(wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(c0, cr)), wo(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, csn(cmnf))))
  elun(c0, cr, csn(cmnf))
  orcom(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)))
  orbi1d(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf))
  elsng(c1, cxr, cpnf)
  andir(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), c1), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(c1, cr)))
  brxp(c0, csn(cmnf), cr, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wb(wa(wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr))))
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf))
  elsng(c0, cxr, cmnf)
  orass(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr)))
  bitri(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wo(wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1), wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1)), wbr(c0, cun(copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr))), c1))
  breqi(c0, clt, c1, cun(copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr))))
  df-ltxr(hs0, hs1)
  brun(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1)
  orass(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wo(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cltrr, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(c0, cltrr, c1))
}

blocks.name: elxr
blocks.content: Membership in the set of extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm elxr(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxr), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cxr), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wcel(c0, cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))), wo(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))))
  eleq2i(c0, cxr, cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)))
  df-xr()
  elun(c0, cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))
  bitr4i(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wo(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))))
  orbi2i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  elpr2(c0, cpnf, cmnf)
  pnfex()
  elexi(cmnf, cxr)
  mnfxr()
  3orass(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))
}

blocks.name: xrnemnf
blocks.content: An extended real other than minus infinity is real or positive infinite. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrnemnf(class c0) {
  |- wb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf)), wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf)), wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wa(wo(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wn(wceq(c0, cmnf))), wa(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wn(wceq(c0, cmnf))))
  pm5.61(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wceq(c0, cmnf))
  anbi12i(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf), wo(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wn(wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cxr), wo(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wceq(c0, cmnf)), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  elxr(c0)
  df-3or(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))
  df-ne(c0, cmnf)
  pm4.71i(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wn(wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  neneqd(c0, cmnf, wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)))
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wne(c0, cmnf))
  renemnf(c0)
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cpnf), wne(c0, cmnf), wne(cpnf, cmnf))
  pnfnemnf()
  neeq1(c0, cpnf, cmnf)
}

blocks.name: xrnepnf
blocks.content: An extended real other than plus infinity is real or negative infinite. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrnepnf(class c0) {
  |- wb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cpnf)), wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cpnf)), wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wa(wo(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wn(wceq(c0, cpnf))), wa(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wn(wceq(c0, cpnf))))
  pm5.61(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wceq(c0, cpnf))
  anbi12i(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cpnf), wo(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wn(wceq(c0, cpnf)))
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cxr), wo(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wceq(c0, cpnf)), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wo(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  elxr(c0)
  df-3or(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))
  or32(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))
  df-ne(c0, cpnf)
  pm4.71i(wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wn(wceq(c0, cpnf)))
  neneqd(c0, cpnf, wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf), wne(c0, cpnf))
  renepnf(c0)
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cmnf), wne(c0, cpnf), wne(cmnf, cpnf))
  mnfnepnf()
  neeq1(c0, cmnf, cpnf)
}

blocks.name: xrltnr
blocks.content: The extended real 'less than' is irreflexive. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrltnr(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c0)))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxr), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c0)), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  elxr(c0)
  3jaoi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c0)))
  ltnr(c0)
  mtbiri(wceq(c0, cpnf), wbr(c0, clt, c0), wbr(cpnf, clt, cpnf))
  mtbir(wbr(cpnf, clt, cpnf), wo(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cpnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cpnf, cltrr, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(cpnf, cr), wceq(cpnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wcel(cpnf, cr)))))
  pm3.2ni(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cpnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cpnf, cltrr, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(cpnf, cr), wceq(cpnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wcel(cpnf, cr))))
  pm3.2ni(wa(wa(wcel(cpnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cpnf, cltrr, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf)))
  intnanr(wa(wcel(cpnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cpnf, cltrr, cpnf))
  intnan(wcel(cpnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr))
  intnanr(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))
  neii(cpnf, cmnf)
  pm3.2ni(wa(wcel(cpnf, cr), wceq(cpnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wcel(cpnf, cr)))
  intnanr(wcel(cpnf, cr), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))
  intnan(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wcel(cpnf, cr))
  neli(cpnf, cr)
  pnfnre()
  mp2an(wb(wbr(cpnf, clt, cpnf), wo(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cpnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cpnf, cltrr, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(cpnf, cr), wceq(cpnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cpnf, cmnf), wcel(cpnf, cr))))), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  ltxr(cpnf, cpnf)
  anidms(wceq(c0, cpnf), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c0), wbr(cpnf, clt, cpnf)))
  breq12(c0, cpnf, c0, cpnf, clt)
  mtbiri(wceq(c0, cmnf), wbr(c0, clt, c0), wbr(cmnf, clt, cmnf))
  mtbir(wbr(cmnf, clt, cmnf), wo(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cmnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cmnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cmnf, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wceq(cmnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wcel(cmnf, cr)))))
  pm3.2ni(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cmnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cmnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cmnf, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wceq(cmnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wcel(cmnf, cr))))
  pm3.2ni(wa(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cmnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cmnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cmnf, cpnf)))
  intnanr(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cmnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cmnf))
  intnan(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cmnf, cr))
  intnan(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cmnf, cpnf))
  nesymi(cmnf, cpnf)
  pnfnemnf()
  pm3.2ni(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wceq(cmnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wcel(cmnf, cr)))
  intnanr(wcel(cmnf, cr), wceq(cmnf, cpnf))
  intnan(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wcel(cmnf, cr))
  neli(cmnf, cr)
  mnfnre()
  mp2an(wb(wbr(cmnf, clt, cmnf), wo(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cmnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cmnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cmnf, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wceq(cmnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wcel(cmnf, cr))))), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  ltxr(cmnf, cmnf)
  anidms(wceq(c0, cmnf), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c0), wbr(cmnf, clt, cmnf)))
  breq12(c0, cmnf, c0, cmnf, clt)
}

blocks.name: ltpnf
blocks.content: Any (finite) real is less than plus infinity. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: ltpnfd
blocks.content: Any (finite) real is less than plus infinity. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: 0ltpnf
blocks.content: Zero is less than plus infinity. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 8-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: mnflt
blocks.content: Minus infinity is less than any (finite) real. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: mnfltd

blocks.name: mnflt0

blocks.name: mnfltpnf
blocks.content: Minus infinity is less than plus infinity. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm mnfltpnf() {
  |- wbr(cmnf, clt, cpnf)
} = {
  mpbir(wbr(cmnf, clt, cpnf), wo(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wceq(cpnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wcel(cpnf, cr)))))
  orci(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wceq(cpnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wcel(cpnf, cr))))
  mp2an(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))), wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))
  eqid(cmnf)
  eqid(cpnf)
  olc(wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf)), wa(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cpnf)))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(cmnf, clt, cpnf), wo(wo(wa(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(cpnf, cr)), wbr(cmnf, cltrr, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wceq(cpnf, cpnf))), wo(wa(wcel(cmnf, cr), wceq(cpnf, cpnf)), wa(wceq(cmnf, cmnf), wcel(cpnf, cr))))), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  pnfxr()
  ltxr(cmnf, cpnf)
}

blocks.name: mnfltxr
blocks.content: Minus infinity is less than an extended real that is either real or plus infinity. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2006.)

blocks.name: pnfnlt

blocks.name: nltmnf
blocks.content: No extended real is less than minus infinity. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2005.)

thm nltmnf(class c0) {

} = {

  pm3.2ni(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cmnf, cr)), wbr(c0, cltrr, cmnf)), wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(cmnf, cpnf)))

blocks.name: pnfge
blocks.content: Plus infinity is an upper bound for extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jan-2006.)

blocks.name: xnn0n0n1ge2b
blocks.content: An extended nonnegative integer is neither 0 nor 1 if and only if it is greater than or equal to 2. (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm xnn0n0n1ge2b(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wb(wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)), wbr(nat2, cle, c0)))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wb(wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)), wbr(nat2, cle, c0)), wo(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(c0, cpnf)))
  elxnn0(c0)
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(c0, cpnf), wb(wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)), wbr(nat2, cle, c0)))
  nn0n0n1ge2b(c0)
  2thd(wceq(c0, cpnf), wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)), wbr(nat2, cle, c0))
  jca(wceq(c0, cpnf), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cpnf), wne(c0, nat0), wne(cpnf, nat0))
  necomi(cpnf, nat0)
  ax-mp(wne(nat0, cpnf), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  nn0nepnf(nat0)
  neeq1(c0, cpnf, nat0)
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cpnf), wne(c0, nat1), wne(cpnf, nat1))
  necomi(cpnf, nat1)
  ax-mp(wne(nat1, cpnf), wcel(nat1, cn0))
  1nn0()
  nn0nepnf(nat1)
  neeq1(c0, cpnf, nat1)
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cpnf), wbr(nat2, cle, c0), wbr(nat2, cle, cpnf))
  ax-mp(wbr(nat2, cle, cpnf), wcel(nat2, cxr))
  rexri(nat2)
  2re()
  pnfge(nat2)
  breq2(c0, cpnf, nat2, cle)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xnn0n0n1ge2b(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ0* →((c0 ≠ 0 ∧ c0 ≠ 1)↔ 2[≤]c0))
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ℕ0*, ((c0 ≠ 0 ∧ c0 ≠ 1)↔ 2[≤]c0), (c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∨ c0 = +∞))
  elxnn0(c0)
  jaoi(c0 ∈ ℕ0, c0 = +∞, ((c0 ≠ 0 ∧ c0 ≠ 1)↔ 2[≤]c0))
  nn0n0n1ge2b(c0)
  2thd(c0 = +∞, (c0 ≠ 0 ∧ c0 ≠ 1), 2[≤]c0)
  jca(c0 = +∞, c0 ≠ 0, c0 ≠ 1)
  mpbiri(c0 = +∞, c0 ≠ 0, +∞ ≠ 0)
  necomi(cpnf, nat0)
  ax-mp(0 ≠ +∞, 0 ∈ ℕ0)
  0nn0()
  nn0nepnf(nat0)
  neeq1(c0, cpnf, nat0)
  mpbiri(c0 = +∞, c0 ≠ 1, +∞ ≠ 1)
  necomi(cpnf, nat1)
  ax-mp(1 ≠ +∞, 1 ∈ ℕ0)
  1nn0()
  nn0nepnf(nat1)
  neeq1(c0, cpnf, nat1)
  mpbiri(c0 = +∞, 2[≤]c0, 2[≤]+∞)
  ax-mp(2[≤]+∞, 2 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexri(nat2)
  2re()
  pnfge(nat2)
  breq2(c0, cpnf, nat2, cle)
}

blocks.name: xnn0ge0

blocks.name: mnfle

blocks.name: xrltnsym
blocks.content: Ordering on the extended reals is not symmetric. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrltnsym(class c0, class c1) {

  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(cpnf, clt, c0)))

  elxr(c1)

  mtbird(wa(wceq(c0, cpnf), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(cpnf, clt, c1))
  adantl(wceq(c0, cpnf), wcel(c1, cxr), wn(wbr(cpnf, clt, c1)))

  a1d(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))

  adantr(wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, cmnf)))

blocks.name: xrltnsym2

blocks.name: xrlttri
blocks.content: Ordering on the extended reals satisfies strict trichotomy. New proofs should generally use this instead of ~ ax-pre-lttri or ~ axlttri . (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)

  con1d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  biimprd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wo(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0))), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  axlttri(c0, c1)
  pm2.24d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))

  ltpnf(c0)

  a1d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cmnf)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))

  breq12(c0, cmnf, c1, cpnf, clt)
  a1d(wa(wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cmnf)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))

blocks.name: xrltso
blocks.content: 'Less than' is a strict ordering on the extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrltso() {
  |- wor(clt, cxr)
} = {
  isso2i(hs0, hs1, hs2, clt, cxr)
  xrlttri(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  xrlttr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
  diff.hs2.c(clt)
  diff.hs2.c(cxr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xrltso() {
  ⊢ < ≺ ℝ*
} = {
  isso2i(hs0, hs1, hs2, clt, cxr)
  xrlttri(hs0, hs1)
  xrlttr(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
  diff.hs2.c(clt)
  diff.hs2.c(cxr)
}

thm xrleloe(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1))))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))

  bitri(wo(wceq(c1, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  orbi1i(wceq(c1, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  eqcom(c1, c0)
  orcom(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c1))

  ancoms(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wn(wo(wceq(c1, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))))

blocks.name: xrleltne
blocks.content: 'Less than or equal to' implies 'less than' is not 'equals', for extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 9-Feb-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrleltne(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wne(c1, c0)))
} = {
  3impa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wne(c1, c0)))
  syl6bbr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wne(c1, c0), wne(c0, c1))
  necon2abid(c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  impbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))))
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(c0, c1), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wa(wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
  xrlttri3(c0, c1)
  simpl(wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  ord(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  biimpa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1)))

blocks.name: dfle2

thm dfle2() {
  |- wceq(cle, cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr)))
} = {
  eqbrriv(hs0, hs1, cle, cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr)))
  lerel()
  mp2(wrel(cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr))), wss(cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr)), cxp(cxr, cxr)), wrel(cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  relxp(cxr, cxr)
  relss(cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr)), cxp(cxr, cxr))
  pm5.21nii(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr)), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr)))
  brel(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1), cxr, cxr)
  lerelxr()
  brel(cv(hs0), cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr)), cv(hs1), cxr, cxr)
  unssi(clt, cres(cid, cxr), cxp(cxr, cxr))
  ltrelxr()
  idssxp(cxr)
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr)), cv(hs1)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, cxr), cv(hs1))))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, cxr), cv(hs1))), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  xrleloe(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  orbi2d(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, cxr), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  resieq(cv(hs0), cxr, cv(hs1))
  brun(cv(hs0), clt, cres(cid, cxr), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr)))
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(cun(clt, cres(cid, cxr)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfle2() {
  ⊢ ≤ =(< ⋃(= |` ℝ*))
} = {
  eqbrriv(hs0, hs1, cle, (< ⋃(= |` ℝ*)))
  lerel()
  mp2(Rel((< ⋃(= |` ℝ*))), (< ⋃(= |` ℝ*))⊆(ℝ* × ℝ*), Rel((ℝ* × ℝ*)))
  relxp(cxr, cxr)
  relss((< ⋃(= |` ℝ*)), (ℝ* × ℝ*))
  pm5.21nii(hs0[≤]hs1, hs0[(< ⋃(= |` ℝ*))]hs1, (hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ*))
  brel(hs0, cle, hs1, cxr, cxr)
  lerelxr()
  brel(hs0, (< ⋃(= |` ℝ*)), hs1, cxr, cxr)
  unssi(clt, (= |` ℝ*), (ℝ* × ℝ*))
  ltrelxr()
  idssxp(cxr)
  syl6bbr((hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ*), hs0[≤]hs1, hs0[(< ⋃(= |` ℝ*))]hs1, (hs0[<]hs1 ∨ hs0[(= |` ℝ*)]hs1))
  bitr4d((hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ*), hs0[≤]hs1, (hs0[<]hs1 ∨ hs0[(= |` ℝ*)]hs1), (hs0[<]hs1 ∨ hs0 = hs1))
  xrleloe(hs0, hs1)
  orbi2d((hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ*), hs0[<]hs1, hs0[(= |` ℝ*)]hs1, hs0 = hs1)
  resieq(hs0, cxr, hs1)
  brun(hs0, clt, (= |` ℝ*), hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c((< ⋃(= |` ℝ*)))
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c((< ⋃(= |` ℝ*)))
}

  brel(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1), cxr, cxr)
  ltrelxr()
  brel(cv(hs0), cdif(cle, cid), cv(hs1), cxr, cxr)
  sstri(cdif(cle, cid), cxp(cxr, cxr), cle)

  lerelxr()
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdif(cle, cid), cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)))))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  xrltlen(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  anbi2i(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1))))
  necon3abii(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)))
  bitr4i(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  equcom(hs1, hs0)
  ideq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  brdif(cv(hs0), cle, cid, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cle, cid))
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(cle, cid))
}

thm dflt2() {
  ⊢ < =(≤ \ =)
} = {
  eqbrriv(hs0, hs1, clt, (≤ \ =))

  syl6bbr((hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ*), hs0[<]hs1, hs0[(≤ \ =)]hs1, (hs0[≤]hs1 ∧ ¬ hs0[=]hs1))
  syl6bb((hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ*), hs0[<]hs1, (hs0[≤]hs1 ∧ ¬ hs0[=]hs1), (hs0[≤]hs1 ∧ hs1 ≠ hs0))
  xrltlen(hs0, hs1)

  necon3abii(hs1, hs0, hs0[=]hs1)

blocks.name: xrlelttr
blocks.content: Transitive law for ordering on extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jan-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrlelttr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))
} = {
  impd(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1))))
  xrleloe(c0, c1)
  jaod(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))
  expd(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  xrlttr(c0, c1, c2)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2))))
  biimprd(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  breq1(c0, c1, clt, c2)
}

blocks.name: xrltletr

thm xrltletr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))
} = {

  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wo(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wceq(c1, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c2), wo(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wceq(c1, c2))))
  xrleloe(c1, c2)
  jaod(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))
  expcomd(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  xrlttr(c0, c1, c2)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2))))
  biimpd(wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2))

blocks.name: xrletr
blocks.content: Transitive law for ordering on extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 9-Feb-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrletr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
} = {
  expimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c2))

  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c2), wo(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wceq(c1, c2))))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c2), wo(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wceq(c1, c2))))
  xrleloe(c1, c2)
  jaod(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  expdimp(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  syld(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  xrlelttr(c0, c1, c2)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
  xrltle(c0, c2)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
  biimpcd(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c2))

}

blocks.name: nltpnft
blocks.content: An extended real is not less than plus infinity iff they are equal. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jan-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm nltpnft(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wb(wceq(c0, cpnf), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))))
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)))
  mtbiri(wceq(c0, cpnf), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf), wbr(cpnf, clt, cpnf))
  ax-mp(wn(wbr(cpnf, clt, cpnf)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  xrltnr(cpnf)
  breq1(c0, cpnf, clt, cpnf)
  ord(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf), wceq(c0, cpnf))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cxr), wo(wbr(c0, clt, cpnf), wceq(c0, cpnf)), wbr(c0, cle, cpnf))
  pnfge(c0)
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cxr), wb(wbr(c0, cle, cpnf), wo(wbr(c0, clt, cpnf), wceq(c0, cpnf))), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  xrleloe(c0, cpnf)
}

blocks.name: ngtmnft
blocks.content: An extended real is not greater than minus infinity iff they are equal. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm ngtmnft(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wb(wceq(c0, cmnf), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0))))
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(c0, cmnf), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0)))
  mtbiri(wceq(c0, cmnf), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(cmnf, clt, cmnf))
  ax-mp(wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cmnf)), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  xrltnr(cmnf)
  breq2(c0, cmnf, cmnf, clt)
  syl6ib(wcel(c0, cxr), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0)), wceq(c0, cmnf), wceq(cmnf, c0))
  ord(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wceq(cmnf, c0))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cxr), wo(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wceq(cmnf, c0)), wbr(cmnf, cle, c0))
  mnfle(c0)
  mpan(wcel(c0, cxr), wb(wbr(cmnf, cle, c0), wo(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wceq(cmnf, c0))), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  xrleloe(cmnf, c0)
  eqcom(cmnf, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ngtmnft(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ* →(c0 = -∞ ↔ ¬ -∞[<]c0))
} = {
  impbid2(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c0 = -∞, ¬ -∞[<]c0)
  mtbiri(c0 = -∞, -∞[<]c0, -∞[<]-∞)
  ax-mp(¬ -∞[<]-∞, -∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  xrltnr(cmnf)
  breq2(c0, cmnf, cmnf, clt)
  syl6ib(c0 ∈ ℝ*, ¬ -∞[<]c0, c0 = -∞, -∞ = c0)
  ord(c0 ∈ ℝ*, -∞[<]c0, -∞ = c0)
  mpbid(c0 ∈ ℝ*, (-∞[<]c0 ∨ -∞ = c0), -∞[≤]c0)
  mnfle(c0)
  mpan(c0 ∈ ℝ*, (-∞[≤]c0 ↔(-∞[<]c0 ∨ -∞ = c0)), -∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  mnfxr()
  xrleloe(cmnf, c0)
  eqcom(cmnf, c0)
}

blocks.name: xrrebnd
blocks.content: An extended real is real iff it is strictly bounded by infinities. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrrebnd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wb(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))))
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c0, cr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)))
  jca(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))
  mnflt(c0)
  ltpnf(c0)
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cxr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)), wcel(c0, cr), wn(wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))))
  con2bid(wcel(c0, cxr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)), wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cxr), wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wn(wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))), wo(wn(wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0))))
  orbi12d(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0)))
  nltpnft(c0)
  ngtmnft(c0)
  bitr2i(wo(wn(wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0))), wn(wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))), wo(wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))))
  ianor(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))
  orcom(wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)))
  ord(wcel(c0, cxr), wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wcel(c0, cr))
  sylbb(wcel(c0, cxr), wo(wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wcel(c0, cr)), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  elxr(c0)
  bitri(w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wo(wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wcel(c0, cr)), wo(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))))
  3orass(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))
  orcom(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
}

blocks.name: xrre
blocks.content: A way of proving that an extended real is real. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrre(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wcel(c0, cr))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))
  mpan2d(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))
  ltpnf(c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c1)
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  xrlelttr(c0, c1, cpnf)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))))
  xrrebnd(c0)
}

blocks.name: xrre2
blocks.content: An extended real between two others is real. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrre2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wcel(c1, cr))
} = {
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wcel(c1, cr))
  sylibrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)))
  anim12d(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(cmnf, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(cmnf, clt, c1)))
  mpand(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(cmnf, clt, c1), wbr(cmnf, cle, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(cmnf, cle, c0))
  mnfle(c0)
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wi(wa(wbr(cmnf, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(cmnf, clt, c1)), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  xrlelttr(cmnf, c0, c1)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)))
  mpan2d(wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf), wbr(c2, cle, cpnf))
  adantl(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c2, cle, cpnf))
  pnfge(c2)
  mp3an3(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wi(wa(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, cpnf)), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  xrltletr(c1, c2, cpnf)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wcel(c1, cr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))))
  xrrebnd(c1)
}

blocks.name: xrre3
blocks.content: A way of proving that an extended real is real. (Contributed by FL, 29-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrre3(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))), wcel(c0, cr))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))
  adantrr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0))
  mpand(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(cmnf, clt, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, c1))
  mnflt(c1)
  mp3an2i(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wi(wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0)), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c1)
  simpl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr))
  xrltletr(cmnf, c1, c0)
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf)), wb(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cpnf))))
  xrrebnd(c0)
}

blocks.name: xrmax2
blocks.content: An extended real is less than or equal to the maximum of it and another. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrmax2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  breqtrrd(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  xrleid(c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c1))
  iftrue(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  breqtrrd(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  orcanai(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  xrletri(c0, c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c0))
  iffalse(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xrmax2(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)→ c1[≤]if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0))
} = {
  pm2.61dan((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), c1[≤]if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0), c0[≤]c1)
  breqtrrd(c1, cle, if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0), c1, ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)∧ c0[≤]c1))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0[≤]c1, c1[≤]c1)
  xrleid(c1)
  adantl((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), c0[≤]c1, if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0)= c1)
  iftrue(c1, c0, c0[≤]c1)
  breqtrrd(c1, cle, if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0), c0, ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)∧ ¬ c0[≤]c1))
  orcanai((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), c0[≤]c1, c1[≤]c0)
  xrletri(c0, c1)
  adantl((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), ¬ c0[≤]c1, if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0)= c0)
  iffalse(c1, c0, c0[≤]c1)
}

blocks.name: xrmin1
blocks.content: The minimum of two extended reals is less than or equal to one of them. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrmin1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  eqbrtrd(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c0))
  iftrue(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c0))
  xrleid(c0)
  eqbrtrd(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c1))
  iffalse(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  orcanai(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  xrletri(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xrmin1(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)→ if(c0[≤]c1, c0, c1)[≤]c0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), if(c0[≤]c1, c0, c1)[≤]c0, c0[≤]c1)
  eqbrtrd(if(c0[≤]c1, c0, c1), cle, c0, c0, ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)∧ c0[≤]c1))
  adantl((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), c0[≤]c1, if(c0[≤]c1, c0, c1)= c0)
  iftrue(c0, c1, c0[≤]c1)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0[≤]c1, c0[≤]c0)
  xrleid(c0)
  eqbrtrd(if(c0[≤]c1, c0, c1), cle, c0, c1, ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)∧ ¬ c0[≤]c1))
  adantl((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), ¬ c0[≤]c1, if(c0[≤]c1, c0, c1)= c1)
  iffalse(c0, c1, c0[≤]c1)
  orcanai((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), c0[≤]c1, c1[≤]c0)
  xrletri(c0, c1)
}

blocks.origin:
thm xrmaxlt(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wb(wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
} = {
  impbid1(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2)))
  jcad(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  mpand(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  xrmax1(c0, c1)
  syld3an2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cxr))
  xrlelttr(c0, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c2)
  mpand(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  xrmax2(c0, c1)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2)), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cxr))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cxr))
  ifcl(c1, cxr, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  xrlelttr(c1, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c2)
  ancoms(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2))
  ifboth(c1, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  breq1(c1, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2)
  breq1(c0, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), clt, c2)
}

blocks.name: xrltmin
blocks.content: Two ways of saying an extended real is less than the minimum of two others. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrltmin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2))))
} = {
  impbid1(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))
  jcad(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  mpan2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cle, c1))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cle, c1))
  xrmin1(c1, c2)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wbr(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  xrltletr(c0, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), c1)
  mpan2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cle, c2))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cle, c2))
  xrmin2(c1, c2)
  syld3an2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wbr(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wcel(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cxr))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cxr))
  ifcl(c1, cxr, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  xrltletr(c0, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), c2)
  ifboth(c1, c2, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  breq2(c1, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), c0, clt)
  breq2(c2, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), c0, clt)
}

blocks.name: xrmaxle
blocks.content: Two ways of saying the maximum of two numbers is less than or equal to a third. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)

thm xrmaxle(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  jcad(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  mpand(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  xrmax1(c0, c1)
  syld3an2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c2)), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cxr))
  xrletr(c0, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c2)
  mpand(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  xrmax2(c0, c1)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c2)), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cxr))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cxr))
  ifcl(c1, cxr, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  xrletr(c1, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c2)
  ancoms(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c2))
  ifboth(c1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  breq1(c1, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c2)
  breq1(c0, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c2)
}

blocks.name: xrlemin
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a number is less than or equal to the minimum of two others. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrlemin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c2))))
} = {
  impbid1(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))

  mpan2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cif(c1, c2, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), cle, c1))

blocks.name: max1
blocks.content: A number is less than or equal to the maximum of it and another. See also ~ max1ALT . (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-2005.)

blocks.name: max1ALT
blocks.content: A number is less than or equal to the maximum of it and another. This version of ~ max1 omits the ` B e. RR ` antecedent. Although it doesn't exploit undefined behavior, it is still considered poor style, and the use of ~ max1 is preferred. (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-2005.)

blocks.name: max2
blocks.content: A number is less than or equal to the maximum of it and another. (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-2005.)

blocks.name: 2resupmax
blocks.content: The supremum of two real numbers is the maximum of these two numbers. (Contributed by AV, 8-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: min1
blocks.content: The minimum of two numbers is less than or equal to the first. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-2007.)

blocks.name: min2
blocks.content: The minimum of two numbers is less than or equal to the second. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-2007.)

blocks.name: maxle
blocks.content: Two ways of saying the maximum of two numbers is less than or equal to a third. (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2005.)

blocks.name: lemin
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a number is less than or equal to the minimum of two others. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-2007.)

blocks.name: maxlt
blocks.content: Two ways of saying the maximum of two numbers is less than a third. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-2007.)

blocks.name: ltmin
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a number is less than the minimum of two others. (Contributed by NM, 1-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: lemaxle
blocks.content: A real number which is less than or equal to a second real number is less than or equal to the maximum/supremum of the second real number and a third real number. (Contributed by AV, 8-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm lemaxle(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c2, cle, c0)), wbr(c2, cle, cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
} = {
  3impia(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c2, cle, cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
  mpan2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr)), wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c2, cle, cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0))), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
  max2(c1, c0)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr)), wi(wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0)))), wbr(c2, cle, cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0)))), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0)), cr))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0)), cr))
  ifcl(c0, cr, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  letr(c2, c0, cif(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
}

thm lemaxle(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ c2 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2[≤]c0)→ c2[≤]if(c1[≤]c0, c0, c1))
} = {

  simpr((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), c2 ∈ ℝ)
  simpll(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  adantr((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), c2 ∈ ℝ, if(c1[≤]c0, c0, c1)∈ ℝ)
  ifcl(c0, cr, c1, c1[≤]c0)

blocks.name: ifle
blocks.content: An if statement transforms an implication into an inequality of terms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ifle(class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), wbr(cif(c0, c1, w0), cle, cif(c0, c1, w1)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), wbr(cif(c0, c1, w0), cle, cif(c0, c1, w1)), w0)
  3brtr4d(cif(c0, c1, w0), cle, cif(c0, c1, w1), c0, c0, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), w0))
  leidd(c0, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), w0))
  simpll1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wi(w0, w1), w0)
  adantl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), w0, wceq(cif(c0, c1, w0), c0))
  iftrue(c0, c1, w0)
  iftrued(c0, c1, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), w0), w1)
  adantll(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1), w0, w1)
  imp(wi(w0, w1), w0, w1)
  id(wi(w0, w1))
  eqbrtrd(cif(c0, c1, w0), cle, cif(c0, c1, w1), c1, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), wn(w0)))
  adantl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), wn(w0), wceq(cif(c0, c1, w0), c1))
  iffalse(c0, c1, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), wn(w0)), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c0, c1, w1)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  simpll3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wi(w0, w1), wn(w0))
  leidd(c1, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wi(w0, w1)), wn(w0)))
  simpll2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wi(w0, w1), wn(w0))
  ifboth(c0, c1, wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c0, c1, w1)), w1)
  breq2(c0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c1, cle)
  breq2(c1, cif(c0, c1, w1), c1, cle)
}

blocks.name: z2ge
blocks.content: There exists an integer greater than or equal to any two others. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm z2ge(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wrex(s0, cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))))

} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wrex(s0, cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cz), wa(wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cz))
  ifcl(c1, cz, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c0)
  zre(c1)
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  max1(c0, c1)
  max2(c0, c1)
  rspcev(s0, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))), wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  breq2(cv(s0), cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c0, cle)
  breq2(cv(s0), cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), c1, cle)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wbr(c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c1, cle, cif(c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  diff.cif.s(s0, c1, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, c1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ,(c0[≤]s0 ∧ c1[≤]s0)))

  zre(c0)

  jca((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), c0[≤]if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0), c1[≤]if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0))
  max1(c0, c1)
  max2(c0, c1)

  anbi12d(s0 = if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0), c0[≤]s0, c1[≤]s0, c0[≤]if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0), c1[≤]if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0))
  breq2(s0, if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0), c0, cle)
  breq2(s0, if(c0[≤]c1, c1, c0), c1, cle)
  diff.cz.s(s0)

blocks.name: qbtwnre
blocks.content: The rational numbers are dense in ` RR ` : any two real numbers have a rational between them. Exercise 6 of [Apostol] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm qbtwnre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

blocks.name: qbtwnxr
blocks.content: The rational numbers are dense in ` RR* ` : any two extended real numbers have a rational between them. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  sylanb(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  3jaoian(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cxr), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))), w3o(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf), wceq(c1, cmnf)))
  3jaodan(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf), wceq(c1, cmnf), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))))
  3expia(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  qbtwnre(s0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: qsqueeze
blocks.content: If a nonnegative real is less than any positive rational, it is zero. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm qsqueeze(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wral(s0, cq, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), wceq(c0, nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wral(s0, cq, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), wceq(c0, nat0), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wral(s0, cq, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  imp(wcel(c0, cr), wral(s0, cq, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  con4d(wcel(c0, cr), wral(s0, cq, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  syl6ib(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wbr(c0, cle, nat0)), wn(wral(s0, cq, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))))
  sylbird(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wbr(c0, cle, nat0)), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  ltnle(nat0, c0)
  syld(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))))
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  qbtwnre(s0, nat0, c0)
  reximdva(s0, cq, wcel(c0, cr), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))))
  anim2d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cq), wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  qre(cv(s0))
  con2d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))
  ltnsym(c0, cv(s0))
  rexanali(s0, cq, wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wral(s0, cq, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))), wb(wceq(c0, nat0), wbr(c0, cle, nat0)))
  rbaibd(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wceq(c0, nat0), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wbr(c0, cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  letri3(c0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: qextltlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ qextlt and qextle . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm qextltlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syld(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  3expia(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  qbtwnxr(s0, c0, c1)
  reximdva(s0, cq, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))))
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))))
  jca(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wb(wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))
  2thd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))
  mtod(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  xrltle(cv(s0), c0)
  nbbn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))
  sylib(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wb(wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  2thd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))
  simprl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wb(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), cxr))
  simplll(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), cq), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))
  xrltnle(c0, cv(s0))
  xrltled(cv(s0), c1, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  ad2antlr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cxr))
  rexrd(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cq))
  qre(cv(s0))
  simpllr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), cq), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))
  simprr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cq)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))
  nbbn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cxr)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cxr)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: qextlt
blocks.content: An extensionality-like property for extended real ordering. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm qextlt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  ralrimivw(s0, cq, wceq(c0, c1), wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))
  breq2(c0, c1, cv(s0), clt)
  necon4ad(c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wral(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  syl6ib(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wne(c0, c1), wn(wral(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wne(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  xrlttri2(c0, c1)
  jaod(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))))
  qextltlem(s0, c0, c1)
  reximi(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  simpl(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))))))
  qextltlem(s0, c1, c0)
  reximi(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  sylnib(wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)))), wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0)))
  simpl(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))))
  bicom(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))
  rexnal(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: qextle
blocks.content: An extensionality-like property for extended real ordering. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm qextle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  ralrimivw(s0, cq, wceq(c0, c1), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  breq2(c0, c1, cv(s0), cle)
  necon4ad(c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wral(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  syl6ib(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wne(c0, c1), wn(wral(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wne(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  xrlttri2(c0, c1)
  jaod(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))))
  qextltlem(s0, c0, c1)
  reximi(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  simpr(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wrex(s0, cq, wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wrex(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))))))
  qextltlem(s0, c1, c0)
  reximi(s0, cq, wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  sylnib(wa(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)))), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)))
  simpr(wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0))), wn(wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))))
  bicom(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))
  rexnal(s0, cq, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

thm xralrple(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  ralrimdva(s0, crp, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))
  mpan2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wbr(c1, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s0), crp), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)))
  rpge0(cv(s0))

  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)))), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), cxr))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(s0), crp))
  rexrd(c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  rexrd(co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  readdcld(c1, cv(s0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(s0), crp))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s0), crp), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  rpre(cv(s0))
  xrletr(c0, c1, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wral(s0, crp, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)))), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  con2d(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wral(s0, crp, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)))), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  syld(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wn(wral(s0, crp, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs0, cq, wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wrex(hs0, cq, wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr))
  3expia(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wrex(hs0, cq, wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))))
  qbtwnxr(hs0, c1, c0)
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, cq, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)), wn(wral(s0, crp, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))), wn(wral(s0, crp, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, crp, wn(wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))), wrex(s0, crp, wn(wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1), crp), wn(wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1)))))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1), crp), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)))
  simprrl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))), wb(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1), crp)), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  difrp(c1, cv(hs0))
  mtbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))
  simprrr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexrd(cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))))
  xrltnle(cv(hs0), c0)
  breq2d(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1)), cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))))
  pncan3d(c1, cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))))
  recnd(c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))))
  recnd(cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)))))
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  qre(cv(hs0))
  rspcev(s0, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1), crp, wn(wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1)))), wn(wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1))))
  breq2d(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1), c1, caddc)
  rexnal(s0, crp, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c1)
  xrlenlt(c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.w(wn(wral(s0, crp, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))))
  diff.crp.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1))))

blocks.name: xnegcl
blocks.content: Closure of extended real negative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xnegcl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cxne(c0), cxr))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cxne(c0), cxr), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  elxr(c0)
  3jaoi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(cxne(c0), cxr))
  rexrd(cxne(c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  eqeltrd(cxne(c0), cr, cneg(c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  rexneg(c0)

  syl(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cif(cpnf, cif(cmnf, co(c0, caddc, c1), wceq(c1, cmnf)), wceq(c1, cpnf)), cif(cmnf, co(c0, caddc, c1), wceq(c1, cmnf))), wne(c1, cpnf))

blocks.name: rexsub
blocks.content: Extended real subtraction when both arguments are real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexsub(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c0, cxad, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  oveq2d(c0, cxad, cxne(c1), cneg(c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cxne(c1), cneg(c1)))
  rexneg(c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1))), wcel(cneg(c1), cr))
  renegcl(c1)
  rexadd(c0, cneg(c1))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  negsub(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexsub(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)→(c0[+]-e(c1))=(c0[-]c1))
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0[+]-e(c1)), (c0[-]c1), (c0[+]-u(c1)), (c0[+]-u(c1)), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  oveq2d(c0, cxad, -e(c1), -u(c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, -e(c1)= -u(c1))
  rexneg(c1)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, (c0[+]-u(c1))=(c0[+]-u(c1)), -u(c1)∈ ℝ)
  renegcl(c1)
  rexadd(c0, -u(c1))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, (c0[+]-u(c1))=(c0[-]c1), c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  negsub(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: xnn0xaddcl

thm xnn0xaddcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0)), wcel(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxnn0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0)), wcel(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxnn0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  a1d(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0)), wcel(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxnn0))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxnn0), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cxnn0))
  nn0xnn0d(co(c0, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  nn0addcl(c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wb(wcel(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxnn0), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cxnn0)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  nn0re(c0)
  nn0re(c1)
  eleq1d(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxnn0, co(c0, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  rexadd(c0, c1)
  sylbi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0))), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0)), wcel(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxnn0)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, cn0)), wn(wcel(c1, cn0))))
  ianor(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  ex(wo(wn(wcel(c0, cn0)), wn(wcel(c1, cn0))), wa(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0)), wcel(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxnn0))
  syl6eqel(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxnn0, cpnf, wa(wo(wn(wcel(c0, cn0)), wn(wcel(c1, cn0))), wa(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0))))
  imp(wo(wn(wcel(c0, cn0)), wn(wcel(c1, cn0))), wa(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf))
  jaoi(wn(wcel(c0, cn0)), wn(wcel(c1, cn0)), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf)))
  impd(wn(wcel(c0, cn0)), wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf))
  expcom(wn(wcel(c0, cn0)), wcel(c0, cxnn0), wi(wcel(c1, cxnn0), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wn(wcel(c0, cn0))), wi(wcel(c1, cxnn0), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf)), wceq(c0, cpnf))
  xnn0nnn0pnf(c0)
  ex(wceq(c0, cpnf), wcel(c1, cxnn0), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf))
  sylan9eq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf, co(cpnf, cxad, c1), wceq(c0, cpnf), wcel(c1, cxnn0))
  oveq1(c0, cpnf, cxad, c1)
  syl(wcel(c1, cxnn0), wceq(co(cpnf, cxad, c1), cpnf), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)))
  xnn0xrnemnf(c1)
  xaddpnf2(c1)
  impcomd(wn(wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(c0, cxnn0), wcel(c1, cxnn0), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf))
  expcom(wn(wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(c1, cxnn0), wi(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, cxnn0), wn(wcel(c1, cn0))), wi(wcel(c0, cxnn0), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf)), wceq(c1, cpnf))
  xnn0nnn0pnf(c1)
  ex(wceq(c1, cpnf), wcel(c0, cxnn0), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf))

  oveq2(c1, cpnf, c0, cxad)
