thm xaddnemnf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf)), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf))), wne(co(c0, cxad, c1), cmnf))
} = {
  sylanb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf)), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)), wne(co(c0, cxad, c1), cmnf), wo(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf)))
  xrnemnf(c0)
  jaoian(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)), wne(co(c0, cxad, c1), cmnf))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)), wne(co(c0, cxad, c1), cmnf), wo(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  xrnemnf(c1)
  jaodan(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf), wne(co(c0, cxad, c1), cmnf))
  renemnfd(co(c0, cxad, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cxad, c1), cr, co(c0, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  rexadd(c0, c1)
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  eqnetrd(co(c0, cxad, c1), cmnf, cpnf, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  sylan9eqr(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf, co(c0, cxad, cpnf), wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf))
  oveq2(c1, cpnf, c0, cxad)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, cpnf), cpnf), wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf))
  rexr(c0)
  renemnf(c0)
  xaddpnf1(c0)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wne(cpnf, cmnf))
  eqnetrd(co(c0, cxad, c1), cmnf, cpnf, wa(wceq(c0, cpnf), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf))))
  sylan9eq(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf, co(cpnf, cxad, c1), wceq(c0, cpnf), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)))
  oveq1(c0, cpnf, cxad, c1)
  xaddpnf2(c1)
  a1i(wa(wceq(c0, cpnf), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf))), wne(cpnf, cmnf))
  pnfnemnf()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xaddnemnf(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0 ≠ -∞)∧(c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ≠ -∞))→(c0[+]c1)≠ -∞)
} = {
  sylanb((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0 ≠ -∞), (c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ≠ -∞), (c0[+]c1)≠ -∞, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∨ c0 = +∞))
  xrnemnf(c0)
  jaoian(c0 ∈ ℝ, c0 = +∞, (c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ≠ -∞), (c0[+]c1)≠ -∞)
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ ℝ, (c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ≠ -∞), (c0[+]c1)≠ -∞, (c1 ∈ ℝ ∨ c1 = +∞))
  xrnemnf(c1)
  jaodan(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 = +∞, (c0[+]c1)≠ -∞)
  renemnfd((c0[+]c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  eqeltrd((c0[+]c1), cr, (c0[+]c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  rexadd(c0, c1)
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  eqnetrd((c0[+]c1), cmnf, cpnf, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 = +∞))
  sylan9eqr((c0[+]c1), cpnf, (c0[+]+∞), c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 = +∞)
  oveq2(c1, cpnf, c0, cxad)
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ ℝ, (c0[+]+∞)= +∞, c0 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ≠ -∞)
  rexr(c0)
  renemnf(c0)
  xaddpnf1(c0)
  a1i((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 = +∞), +∞ ≠ -∞)
  eqnetrd((c0[+]c1), cmnf, cpnf, (c0 = +∞ ∧(c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ≠ -∞)))
  sylan9eq((c0[+]c1), cpnf, (+∞[+]c1), c0 = +∞, (c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ≠ -∞))
  oveq1(c0, cpnf, cxad, c1)
  xaddpnf2(c1)
  a1i((c0 = +∞ ∧(c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ≠ -∞)), +∞ ≠ -∞)
  pnfnemnf()
}

thm xnegid(class c0) {

} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c0)), nat0), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))

  oveq2d(c0, cxad, cxne(c0), cneg(c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  rexneg(c0)
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, cneg(c0)), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c0))), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
  renegcl(c0)
  rexadd(c0, cneg(c0))
  negidd(c0, wcel(c0, cr))
  recn(c0)
  syl6eq(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c0)), nat0, co(cpnf, cxad, cmnf), wceq(c0, cpnf))
  oveq12d(c0, cxad, cxne(c0), cpnf, cmnf, wceq(c0, cpnf))
  id(wceq(c0, cpnf))
  syl6eq(cxne(c0), cmnf, cxne(cpnf), wceq(c0, cpnf))

  xnegpnf()
  pnfaddmnf()
  syl6eq(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c0)), nat0, co(cmnf, cxad, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))

  syl6eq(cxne(c0), cpnf, cxne(cmnf), wceq(c0, cmnf))

blocks.pretty:
thm xnegid(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ* →(c0[+]-e(c0))= 0)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ℝ*, (c0[+]-e(c0))= 0, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∨ c0 = +∞ ∨ c0 = -∞))
  elxr(c0)
  3jaoi(c0 ∈ ℝ, c0 = +∞, c0 = -∞, (c0[+]-e(c0))= 0)
  3eqtrd((c0[+]-e(c0)), nat0, (c0[+]-u(c0)), (c0[+]-u(c0)), c0 ∈ ℝ)
  oveq2d(c0, cxad, -e(c0), -u(c0), c0 ∈ ℝ)
  rexneg(c0)
  mpdan(c0 ∈ ℝ, (c0[+]-u(c0))=(c0[+]-u(c0)), -u(c0)∈ ℝ)
  renegcl(c0)
  rexadd(c0, -u(c0))
  negidd(c0, c0 ∈ ℝ)
  recn(c0)
  syl6eq((c0[+]-e(c0)), nat0, (+∞[+]-∞), c0 = +∞)
  oveq12d(c0, cxad, -e(c0), cpnf, cmnf, c0 = +∞)
  id(c0 = +∞)
  syl6eq(-e(c0), cmnf, -e(+∞), c0 = +∞)
  xnegeq(c0, cpnf)
  xnegpnf()
  pnfaddmnf()
  syl6eq((c0[+]-e(c0)), nat0, (-∞[+]+∞), c0 = -∞)
  oveq12d(c0, cxad, -e(c0), cmnf, cpnf, c0 = -∞)
  id(c0 = -∞)
  syl6eq(-e(c0), cpnf, -e(-∞), c0 = -∞)
  xnegeq(c0, cmnf)
  xnegmnf()
  mnfaddpnf()
}

blocks.name: xaddcom

thm xaddcom(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))
} = {
  sylanb(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)), w3o(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  elxr(c0)
  3jaoian(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cpnf), wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(c1, cxr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)), w3o(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf), wceq(c1, cmnf)))
  elxr(c1)
  3jaodan(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf), wceq(c1, cmnf), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0), co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  addcom(c0, c1)
  rexadd(c0, c1)
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c1, cxad, c0), co(c1, caddc, c0)))
  rexadd(c1, c0)
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0), cpnf, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  sylan9eqr(co(c0, cxad, c1), cpnf, co(c0, cxad, cpnf), wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf))
  oveq2(c1, cpnf, c0, cxad)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, cpnf), cpnf), wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf))
  xaddpnf1(c0)
  sylan9eqr(co(c1, cxad, c0), cpnf, co(cpnf, cxad, c0), wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf))
  oveq1(c1, cpnf, cxad, c0)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(co(cpnf, cxad, c0), cpnf), wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf))
  renemnf(c0)
  xaddpnf2(c0)
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0), cmnf, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(c1, cmnf)))

thm xaddid1(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ* →(c0[+]0)= c0)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ℝ*, (c0[+]0)= c0, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∨ c0 = +∞ ∨ c0 = -∞))

  renemnf(nat0)
  xaddpnf2(nat0)
  oveq1(c0, cpnf, cxad, nat0)
  id(c0 = +∞)
  3eqtr4a((c0[+]0), c0, (-∞[+]0), cmnf, c0 = -∞)

  0re()

  oveq1(c0, cmnf, cxad, nat0)

}

blocks.name: xaddass
blocks.content: Associativity of extended real addition. The correct condition here is "it is not the case that both ` +oo ` and ` -oo ` appear as one of ` A , B , C ` , i.e. ` -. { +oo , -oo } C_ { A , B , C } ` ", but this condition is difficult to work with, so we break the theorem into two parts: this one, where ` -oo ` is not present in ` A , B , C ` , and ~ xaddass2 , where ` +oo ` is not present. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: xpncan
blocks.content: Extended real version of ~ pncan . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)

thm xpncan(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, cxne(c1)), c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, cxne(c1)), c0, co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, cxne(c1), cneg(c1), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cxne(c1), cneg(c1)))
  rexneg(c1)
  pm2.61dane(c0, cmnf, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, cneg(c1)), c0))
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, cneg(c1)), c0, co(cmnf, cxad, cneg(c1)), cmnf, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(c0, cmnf)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(c0, cmnf)), wceq(co(cmnf, cxad, cneg(c1)), cmnf), wcel(cneg(c1), cr))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c0, cmnf), wcel(cneg(c1), cr))
  syl2anc(wcel(cneg(c1), cr), wceq(co(cmnf, cxad, cneg(c1)), cmnf), wcel(cneg(c1), cxr), wne(cneg(c1), cpnf))
  renepnf(cneg(c1))

blocks.name: xnpcan
blocks.content: Extended real version of ~ npcan . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xnpcan(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cxad, c1), c0))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cxad, c1), c0, co(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cxad, cxne(cxne(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cxad, cxne(cxne(c1)), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cxne(cxne(c1)), c1))
  syl(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cxne(cxne(c1)), c1), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c1)
  xnegneg(c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cxad, cxne(cxne(c1))), c0), wcel(cxne(c1), cr))
  eqeltrd(cxne(c1), cr, cneg(c1), wcel(c1, cr))
  rexneg(c1)
  renegcl(c1)
  xpncan(c0, cxne(c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xnpcan(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)→((c0[+]-e(c1))[+]c1)= c0)
} = {
  eqtr3d(((c0[+]-e(c1))[+]c1), c0, ((c0[+]-e(c1))[+]-e(-e(c1))), (c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  oveq2d((c0[+]-e(c1)), cxad, -e(-e(c1)), c1, (c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, -e(-e(c1))= c1)
  syl(c1 ∈ ℝ, -e(-e(c1))= c1, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexr(c1)
  xnegneg(c1)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, ((c0[+]-e(c1))[+]-e(-e(c1)))= c0, -e(c1)∈ ℝ)
  eqeltrd(-e(c1), cr, -u(c1), c1 ∈ ℝ)
  rexneg(c1)
  renegcl(c1)
  xpncan(c0, -e(c1))
}

thm xmulasslem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {

  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cxne(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cxne(c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

} = {
  mpd(w0, wceq(c0, c1), w3o(wbr(c2, clt, nat0), wceq(c2, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)))

  vtoclga(s0, cxne(c2), cxr, wi(w0, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cxne(c2)), wceq(c3, c4))), wi(w0, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), w1)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cxne(c2)), w0, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), w1), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cxne(c2)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cxne(c2)), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), w1, wbr(nat0, clt, cxne(c2)), wceq(c3, c4))
  breq2(cv(s0), cxne(c2), nat0, clt)

  xneg11(c0, c1)
  mpcom(w0, wi(wceq(c2, nat0), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  vtoclg(s0, c2, cxr, wi(w0, wi(wceq(c2, nat0), wceq(c0, c1))), wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), w1)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c2), w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), w1), wi(wceq(c2, nat0), wceq(c0, c1)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), nat0), w1, wceq(c2, nat0), wceq(c0, c1))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), c2, nat0)
  mpcom(w0, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cxr))

  breq2(cv(s0), c2, nat0, clt)
  com12(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), w0, wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), w1))
  exp32(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), w1)

  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: xmulass
blocks.content: Associativity of the extended real multiplication operation. Surprisingly, there are no restrictions on the values, unlike ~ xaddass which has to avoid the "undefined" combinations ` +oo +e -oo ` and ` -oo +e +oo ` . The equivalent "undefined" expression here would be ` 0 *e +oo ` , but since this is defined to equal ` 0 ` any zeroes in the expression make the whole thing evaluate to zero (on both sides), thus establishing the identity in this case. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: xlemul1a
blocks.content: Extended real version of ~ lemul1a . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xlemul1a(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cxmu, c2), cle, co(c1, cxmu, c2)))
} = {
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cxmu, c2), cle, co(c1, cxmu, c2)))
  3impia(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wi(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cxmu, c2), cle, co(c1, cxmu, c2))))
  expimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wi(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cxmu, c2), cle, co(c1, cxmu, c2))))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wi(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cxmu, c2), cle, co(c1, cxmu, c2))), wo(wbr(nat0, clt, c2), wceq(nat0, c2)))

blocks.name: xadddi
blocks.content: Distributive property for extended real addition and multiplication. Like ~ xaddass , this has an unusual domain of correctness due to counterexamples like ` ( +oo x. ( 2 - 1 ) ) = -oo =/= ` ` ( ( +oo x. 2 ) - ( +oo x. 1 ) ) = ( +oo - +oo ) = 0 ` . In this theorem we show that if the multiplier is real then everything works as expected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: xadd4d

thm xadd4d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, co(c2, cxad, c3)), co(co(c0, cxad, c2), cxad, co(c1, cxad, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wne(c2, cmnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c3, cxr), wne(c3, cmnf)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, co(c2, cxad, c3)), co(co(c0, cxad, c2), cxad, co(c1, cxad, c3)), co(c0, cxad, co(co(c2, cxad, c1), cxad, c3)), co(c0, cxad, co(c2, cxad, co(c1, cxad, c3))), w0)

  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c2, cxad, c1), cxad, c3), co(c2, cxad, co(c1, cxad, c3))), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wne(c2, cmnf)), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)), wa(wcel(c3, cxr), wne(c3, cmnf)))
  xaddass(c2, c1, c3)
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, co(c2, cxad, c3)), co(c0, cxad, co(co(c2, cxad, c1), cxad, c3)), co(c0, cxad, co(c1, cxad, co(c2, cxad, c3))), w0)
  syl112anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, co(c2, cxad, c3)), co(c0, cxad, co(c1, cxad, co(c2, cxad, c3)))), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf)), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)), wcel(co(c2, cxad, c3), cxr), wne(co(c2, cxad, c3), cmnf))
  xaddcld(c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wne(co(c2, cxad, c3), cmnf), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wne(c2, cmnf)), wa(wcel(c3, cxr), wne(c3, cmnf)))

  xaddass(c0, c1, co(c2, cxad, c3))

  xaddcom(c2, c1)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cxad, c2), cxad, c3), co(c1, cxad, co(c2, cxad, c3))), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wne(c2, cmnf)), wa(wcel(c3, cxr), wne(c3, cmnf)))
  xaddass(c1, c2, c3)
  syl112anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cxad, c2), cxad, co(c1, cxad, c3)), co(c0, cxad, co(c2, cxad, co(c1, cxad, c3)))), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf)), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wne(c2, cmnf)), wcel(co(c1, cxad, c3), cxr), wne(co(c1, cxad, c3), cmnf))

blocks.name: xnn0add4d
blocks.content: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a sum for extended addition of extended nonnegative integers, analogous to ~ xadd4d . (Contributed by AV, 12-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm xnn0add4d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cxad, c1), cxad, co(c2, cxad, c3)), co(co(c0, cxad, c2), cxad, co(c1, cxad, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxnn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxnn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxnn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cxnn0))
} = {
  xadd4d(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c0, cmnf)), wcel(c0, cxnn0))
  xnn0xrnemnf(c0)
  syl(w0, wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)), wcel(c1, cxnn0))
  xnn0xrnemnf(c1)
  syl(w0, wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wne(c2, cmnf)), wcel(c2, cxnn0))
  xnn0xrnemnf(c2)
  syl(w0, wa(wcel(c3, cxr), wne(c3, cmnf)), wcel(c3, cxnn0))
  xnn0xrnemnf(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xnn0add4d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[+]c1)[+](c2[+]c3))=((c0[+]c2)[+](c1[+]c3)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℕ0*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℕ0*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℕ0*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℕ0*)
} = {
  xadd4d(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0 ≠ -∞), c0 ∈ ℕ0*)
  xnn0xrnemnf(c0)
  syl(w0, (c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ≠ -∞), c1 ∈ ℕ0*)
  xnn0xrnemnf(c1)
  syl(w0, (c2 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ≠ -∞), c2 ∈ ℕ0*)
  xnn0xrnemnf(c2)
  syl(w0, (c3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c3 ≠ -∞), c3 ∈ ℕ0*)
  xnn0xrnemnf(c3)
}
